channel.title: Log in Log out Glitch
channel.description:
I have the Allstarscape base, that was once Viet Ownage, and again coded with Pk Paradise, and it seems none of them fixed this glitch, so I need help. It happens when you either try to logg in or teleport. It loggs you on then off right away, and it doesn't stop doing that...like it will do it until either the server restarts, or until your client crashes. So I have my restarter set for 10 mins because of that glitch. Can anyone tell me what I can do to fix this problem?
Thanks a lot if you can.

item.title: Log in Log out Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Psycotix Psycotix
item.description:
@Psycotix wrote:

[quote=“Denoria, post:1, topic:273936”][quote author=Psycotix link=topic=361882.msg2751751#msg2751751 date=1239946170]

[quote author=Denoria link=topic=361882.msg2751648#msg2751648 date=1239941553]

I highly suggest for you to use another source, recommened delta based,
Allstar is too ewww, anyways idk how to fix your glitch

Thanks,
Denoria

Note: I’m just saying allstar is no no, no one will come on it lol.

Your a total idiot, delta is overused and its plain shit ^^
[/quote]Hi, You look like an idiot to me, didn’t you mean yourself.
Just because i like delta, thats a bit out of line don’t you think boy?

Edit: Yeah you’d say that since you can’t code lol…go to allstar and yea bye.

Thanks,
Denoria.

You can’t code either, and Spades I’ve never heard of that so I would suggest getting another source
[/quote]Wow…What have you got against me, i know your hiding your love.[/quote]:o You found out my secret, babe, I love you, I’m going to strip your ass, then I will fuck (anal) you so hard.

Read full topic
